data.title: Mobile Web Augmented Reality in 5G and Beyond: Challenges, Opportunities, and Future Directions
data.meta_description: MobileWebAugmentedRealityin5GandBeyondChallengesOpportunitiesandFutureDirections - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses the challenges, opportunities, and future directions of mobile web augmented reality (MWAR) in 5G and beyond networks. It describes the authors' design and development of a service-oriented framework called MWAR5 to provide a scalable, flexible, and easy to deploy MWAR solution. The authors evaluate MWAR5's performance in an actual 5G trial network and share experiences and insights from the development. Exciting future directions of MWAR over 5G and beyond networks are also discussed.
data.text: Mobile Web Augmented Reality in 5G and Beyond: Challenges, Opportunities, and Future Directions
